attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Five-time Oscar-winner John Barry is the UK's premier composer of film music, having written for more than one hundred films. 2007 marks his 50th year in the music business, in a career which has progressed from leading a pop group to becoming a multiple award-winning composer. This should be recognised with the top honour by the country of his birth.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "award John Barry a Knighthood."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14957.asp

Prime Minister's Office
